name: Slap City: Remastered
description:
What if the original Slap City was remastered?

Made by Marcus Krogh (Krogh) og Steven Tran (Peanut Gamer)

Controls ->

A + D = Slap Left/Right 

Left/Right arrows = Move Left/Right

Space = Special

Escape = Return To MainMenu or EXIT if on main

There are 4 modes:

TimeAttack: Get as high a score as you can in X time, failslapping results in time loss.

ScoreAttack: Get X score as quick as possible, failsplapping results in score loss.

Endless: One life, get as high a score as you can

Classic: One life, get as high a score as you can. Authentic to the original slapcity, your special is different, there are "What ifs" and only one butt.
